channel.title: Question concerning dev teams
channel.description:
So I was wondering...
Are current servers actually able to make a "dev team" a "dev team" I would had thought would be non hosted server.
Several of the teams ( this even goes for server dev threads ) a lot of the servers are already hosted.
Development of something in the programming language is referred to something that is not fully constructed yet.

item.title: Question concerning dev teams
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well, just report anyone that’s doing it wrong and a mod can handle it. If this is an issue after the server advertisements board is added, then post this topic here again. Thanks.

Resolved.

Read full topic

item.title: Question concerning dev teams
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

But that’s about what happens lol ( sorry took so long to post been gone this weekend )

Name three threads that have actual development updates. Name three threads that I can’t go to the section and then search the name of the server/poster for the server on the serverstatus page. Even kroniz is pretty much advertising. HE made forums the very exact day the development was made. ( not meaning to target anybody but it was first one that came to mind )

Read full topic

item.title: Question concerning dev teams
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We don’t have an issue with them hosting a server as long as they are not using the board to try and advertise.

Read full topic

item.title: Question concerning dev teams
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You have a valid point. I think we will try to fix part of the issue with possibly reopening the advertisements board.

As far as the actual section goes, I almost think as though the development section should be rethought. It doesn’t achieve its original goals because it’s gone unhandled over the years.

Read full topic

item.title: Question concerning dev teams
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

That’s the thing though. I am always having to post in server development and development teams. “What are your objectives” you can’t start a development with no goals. Let’s be honest about 80% of the time it’s really just advertisement. There needs to be some sort of stipulation I would think.

Read full topic

item.title: Question concerning dev teams
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I don’t particularly get what you’re saying? If you’re implying that a server development team can’t actually be what it says on the tin as servers are already fully constructed, then I wouldn’t necessarily agree with you. Server development teams usually have a list of criteria that they look to complete such as creating a certain skill or fixing a certain bug, and that counts as development in my opinion. There are many many flaws with today’s servers that need fixing and further development, and I guess some teams aim to do those things.

I guess it depends on what you consider ‘development’. That’s just what I think anyway.

Read full topic
